heading: Thursday Night
text: Clear to partly cloudy, except clouds decreasing late in the northeast. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s, with some mid 30s near Lake Champlain, and in southern New Hampshire, and some lower 20s in the Adirondacks. North winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs from the upper 40s to mid 50s, with mid to upper 50s in southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west. North winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the morning.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mainly clear from the Green Mountains eastward; some high clouds moving in west of the Greens. Lows from the mid 20s and lower 30s east of the Greens and in the Adirondacks, low to mid 30s elsewhere west of the Greens. Winds diminishing to light and variable.
